comment: I've sent one mail last friday and u were supposed to reply on same within wrkng day . How much time do u need to reply . It is abt one missing transaction . It's been days since i am chasing ICICI bank .
amr:
# ::snt I've sent one mail last friday and u were supposed to reply on same within wrkng day . How much time do u need to reply . It is abt one missing transaction . It's been days since i am chasing ICICI bank .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (s / send-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (m2 / mail
                        :quant 1)
                  :time (d / date-entity
                        :weekday (f / friday)
                        :mod (l / last)))
            :op2 (s2 / suppose-02
                  :ARG1 (y / you)
                  :ARG2 (r / reply-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 m2
                        :time (w / within
                              :op1 (d2 / day)))))
      :snt2 (n / need-01
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (t / time
                  :quant-of (r2 / reply-01
                        :ARG0 y2)))
      :snt3 (t2 / transact-01
            :quant 1
            :ARG1-of (m3 / miss-01))
      :snt4 (c / chase-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (b / bank
                  :mod (c2 / company
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "ICICI")))
            :duration (m4 / multiple
                  :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (d3 / day)))))

# ::snt Hi , an e-mail communication has been sent to you on January , with the details . <URL>

                  :accompanier (d / detail))
            :ARG2 (y / you)
            :time (d2 / date-entity
                  :month 1)))
